messages.secondPerson: {actor} tickles you mercilessly! You can't help but giggle!
messages.thirdPerson: {actor} tickles {target} until they're gasping for air!
messages.untargeted: You tickle yourself. That's... not how tickling works, but okay.
messages.untargetedRoom: {actor} tries to tickle themselves. Science has proven this doesn't work, but they're trying anyway.
